They offered free hot breakfast. Eggs, sausage, pancakes, breakfast sandwhichs, burritos, toast, muffins, ceral, yougut, smoothies, juice, milk, fruit. I give this hotel ***** 5 STARS!!! Thank you Element for the wonderful experience!!!! I know we will be back soon to visit! ITs been amazing!

Reviews.Title: “Great Spot”
Reviews.Author: MrsC32
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned about the location when I booked but I needn't have been. Yes it's a travel to the Strip but if your not planning on gambling all day every day the location works well. We went to a show one night and took our boys for a walk down the strip another night and just parked in the casino carpark with no problems. The rooms are very spacious, clean and modern, we could easily have the four of us in there for an evening without sitting on top of eachother which is what we would have had, had we stayed on the Strip. Only negative comment would be the air conditioner is quite loud in the bedroom and language issues caused some problems at checkout. Will definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Like a hotel should be”
Reviews.Author: markobmf
Reviews.Content: I think people like me were in the focus group when they planned this hotel concept. When I have to be in Vegas I like to stay as far from the strip as possible and this was a good choice. While it was a great room at a great value, it would be better if rooms weren't directly facing the highway.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay, good facilities”
Reviews.Author: AndrewFromMelbourne
Reviews.Content: Stayed for one week. Enjoyed the stay. Nice design. Kitchenette was handy, and room was clean. Breakfast, the pool, and the food store (always open) were all good. Nice, quiet, location in Summerlin. Free wireless internet was reliable and fast (12 mbit speed). The only negatives were that the kitchen dishes were a little unclean (I was going to wash them before using them anyway), the shower leaked onto the bathroom floor a little, and the fire alarm went off on my floor one morning (false alarm). Otherwise, would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “perfect off-strip hotel”
Reviews.Author: vincher1
Reviews.Content: if you have a car, and wouldnt mind driving 20-25minutes to/from the strip, then this hotel is for you. because other than its off strip location, this hotel is perfect. great staff - check in takes 3 minutes. yes, only 3 minutes! took me an hour to get my rent a car. took me more at luxor the last time i stayed there. modern looking - boutique hotel styled room - heavenly bed, rain shower, lcd tv, fridge and microwave free internet - great for those people who need to be online everytime business center - 2 desktops that nobody uses. printed the tickets to "love - cirque de soleil" there. pet friendly - i saw pets all over the hotel free breakfast - weekday selections are slim - 2 kinds of sandwhiches, 3 kinds of cereal, 3 kinds of juices, a couple of pastries and thats it. weekend selections add pancakes, sausages and scrambled eggs to the choices mentioned above

Reviews.Title: “Love it”
Reviews.Author: miradab
Reviews.Content: We loved the hotel, the hotel is great and clean. When we arrived, the room type we had requested was not available so they upgraded us to a suite at no extra charge. The suite was large and well kept. Great room for money!

Reviews.Title: “Overly Exceeded My Expectations!!!”
Reviews.Author: dfair00
Reviews.Content: I was looking for rooms "on the strip" and found prices for the weekend to be a bit much. I looked on TripAdvisor and stumbled upon this off the strip hotel. BEST hotel I have ever stayed at in Vegas. Away from the smoke of the strip but close enough to drive to the strip. Recommended for people with a car to get to the strip. For those looking for a retreat hotel -- THE BEST!!! It's remotely located enough to have a secluded feel but close enough to shops and restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel at a great price!”
Reviews.Author: Patar
Reviews.Content: Traveling through and needed somewhere to stay for one night that was "dog friendly". Had never heard of Element, a new chain in the Westin Brand but they allowed pets so we booked. WOW! For less than $100 we got a mini-suite, queen bed room with FULL kitchen. Extremely clean and nicely furnished! Breakfast was free and lncluded the usual fare along with hot items (eggs and pancakes), yogurt "smoothies", and their "signature" english muffin sandwiches of egg whites, tomato and cheese. My husband usually runs in the mornings, rarely using fitness rooms as their equipment is usually so bad. Surprise...the equipment was new and of good quality! I also liked that they had hanging, locked shampoo and soap dispensers in the shower, instead of the plastic, one use bottles. The only issue we had was that their street wasn't in our GPS, so I called the hotel. The hotel is on Discovery Drive, a cross street of Town Center Drive, but the woman working couldn't tell us what "hundred block" of Town Center they were at, or which way we should turn from the road we were on, so we ended up turning the wrong way. I had to call the hotel again, and another woman tried to use MapQuest to help us find the hotel as she didn't know where we were on Town Center even after I gave her cross streets! FYI - they are near 3800 South Town Center.

Reviews.Title: “WOW!! What a suprise!!”
Reviews.Author: woodli2
Reviews.Content: I was travelling with my 16 year old son and didn't know our schedule on the road trip home so my son suggested that we try Hotwire.com... We found this hotel under a three and a half stars for a great price so thought we would give it a try... Now location was nowhere near the strip that we could see, however after walking into our room this evening...Who cares?!! We checked in only 10 minutes after we booked at 11pm looking like something a cat dragged in.. The staff was welcoming and NOT snooty, a great start... And the room...wow... big, immaculate, brand new, bedding is nothing less than what I expect from a Starwood Hotel which means down filled duvets, feathery mattress pads and so many pillows!! Heavan! Shower is huge with rain shower head! And a large flat screen TV topped it off for my son! Nice touch guys! Thank you so much for making our stay wonderful! Will be posting photos soon :-)

HotelInfo.Name: Element by Westin Las Vegas Summerlin
HotelInfo.Address: 10555 Discovery Dr., Las Vegas, NV 89135
